meaning list.meaning: ພອນສະຫວັນ, ຄວາມສາມາດ
meaning list.sentence: She has the ability to solve complex problems.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມສາມາດໃນການແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາທີ່ສັບສົນ.

meaning list.sentence: He is able to swim across the river.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສາມາດລອຍຂ້າມແມ່ນ້ໍາໄດ້.

meaning list.sentence: She is studying abroad for a year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮຽນຢູ່ຕ່າງປະເທດເປັນເວລາ 1 ປີ.

meaning list.sentence: He accepted the job offer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍອມຮັບການສະເຫນີວຽກ.

meaning list.sentence: There was a car accident on the highway.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີອຸບັດຕິເຫດລົດໃຫຍ່ຕຳກັບທາງດ່ວນ.

meaning list.sentence: According to the report, sales have increased.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອີງຕາມບົດລາຍງານ, ການຂາຍເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ
meaning list.sentence: She worked hard to achieve her goals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຮັດວຽກຫນັກເພື່ອບັນລຸເປົ້າຫມາຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປະຕິບັດ, ປະຕິບັດ
meaning list.sentence: He acted bravely in the dangerous situation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະຕິບັດຢ່າງກ້າຫານໃນສະຖານະການອັນຕະລາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ, faal
meaning list.sentence: She is very active in her community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີການເຄື່ອນໄຫວຫຼາຍໃນຊຸມຊົນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແທ້ຈິງແລ້ວ, ແທ້ໆ
meaning list.sentence: Actually, I don’t like coffee that much.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຄວາມເປັນຈິງ, ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ມັກກາເຟຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.sentence: Having a car is an advantage in rural areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີລົດເປັນຂໍ້ໄດ້ປຽບໃນເຂດຊົນນະບົດ.

meaning list.sentence: They went on an exciting adventure in the jungle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ສຸດການຜະຈົນໄພທີ່ຫນ້າຕື່ນເຕັ້ນໃນປ່າ.

meaning list.sentence: The company plans to advertise its new product.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະແນະນໍາຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່ຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.sentence: I saw an advertisement for the concert on TV.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍເຫັນໂຄສະນາຄອນເສີດໃນໂທລະພາບ.

meaning list.sentence: She works in the advertising industry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກໃນອຸດສາຫະກໍາການໂຄສະນາ.

meaning list.sentence: The new policy will affect many people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່ຈະສົ່ງຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່ປະຊາຊົນຈໍານວນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົງກັນຂ້າມ
meaning list.sentence: They were fighting against injustice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຕໍ່ສູ້ຕ້ານກັບຄວາມບໍ່ຍຸດຕິທໍາ.

meaning list.sentence: Ah, now I understand what you mean.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອ້າວ, ດຽວນີ້ຂ້ອຍເຫັນເຈົ້າຫມາຍຄວາມວ່າແນວໃດ.

meaning list.sentence: She booked a flight with a major airline.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈອງຖ້ຽວບິນກັບສາຍການບິນໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຊີວິດຢູ່
meaning list.sentence: He is lucky to be alive after the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໂຊກດີທີ່ມີຊີວິດຢູ່ຫຼັງຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກລົງ (ຄຳອຸທານ)
meaning list.sentence: All right, let's start the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົກລົງ, ມາເລີ່ມການປະຊຸມກັນເລີຍ.

meaning list.sentence: I’m feeling all right today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຮູ້ສຶກດີໃນມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ການອະນຸຍາດ
meaning list.sentence: They don’t allow smoking inside the building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າບໍ່ອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ສູບຢາຢູ່ໃນອາຄານ.

meaning list.sentence: I’m almost finished with my work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍເກືອບແລ້ວ.

meaning list.sentence: She prefers to live alone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຢູ່ຄົນດຽວ.

meaning list.sentence: He traveled alone to the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເດີນທາງໄປພູພຽງຄົນດຽວ.

meaning list.sentence: We walked along the riverbank.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ຍ່າງ​ຕາມ​ແຄມ​ນ​້​ໍ​າ​.

meaning list.sentence: He sang a song as he walked along.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮ້ອງເພງໃນຂະນະທີ່ຍ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແລ້ວ, ແລ້ວ
meaning list.sentence: I have already finished my homework.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍໄດ້ເຮັດວຽກບ້ານແລ້ວ.

meaning list.sentence: We need to find an alternative solution.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງຊອກຫາວິທີແກ້ໄຂທາງເລືອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າ
meaning list.sentence: Although it was raining, they went for a walk.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງ​ແມ່ນ​ວ່າ​ມີ​ຝົນ​ຕົກ, ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ໄປ​ຍ່າງ​.

meaning list.sentence: She was among the top students in her class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນນັກຮຽນທີ່ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດຫຼາຍທີ່ສຸດໃນຫ້ອງຮຽນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: He spent a large amount of money on the car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຊ້ເງິນຈໍານວນຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບູຮານ, ເກົ່າ
meaning list.sentence: They visited the ancient ruins during their trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ການ​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​, ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ໄປ​ຢ້ຽມ​ຢາມ ruins ວັດ​ຖຸ​ບູ​ຮານ​.

meaning list.sentence: She twisted her ankle while running.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢຽບຂໍ້ຕີນໃນຂະນະທີ່ແລ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມີໃຜ, ໃຜ
meaning list.sentence: Does anybody want to join us?
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີໃຜຕ້ອງການເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກັບພວກເຮົາບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: I don’t live there any more.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ອາໄສຢູ່ທີ່ນັ້ນອີກຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນວໃດກໍ່ຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: I was tired, but I went to the party anyway.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍເມື່ອຍແຕ່ຂ້ອຍໄປງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມີບ່ອນໃດ, ທຸກບ່ອນ
meaning list.sentence: You can sit anywhere you like.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດນັ່ງຢູ່ບ່ອນໃດກໍໄດ້ທີ່ທ່ານຕ້ອງການ.

meaning list.sentence: I downloaded a new fitness app on my phone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍໄດ້ດາວໂຫຼດແອັບຟິດເນສໃໝ່ໃສ່ໂທລະສັບຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.sentence: She suddenly appeared at the door.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັນໃດນັ້ນລາວປະກົດຕົວຢູ່ທີ່ປະຕູ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບລັກສະນະ, ຮູບລັກສະນະ
meaning list.sentence: Her appearance has changed a lot over the years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບລັກສະນະຂອງມັນມີການປ່ຽນແປງຫຼາຍໃນຫລາຍປີທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສະຫມັກ
meaning list.sentence: You should apply for the scholarship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນສະຫມັກທຶນການສຶກສາ.

meaning list.sentence: The architect designed a beautiful building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖາປະນິກໄດ້ອອກແບບອາຄານທີ່ສວຍງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖາປັດຕະຍະກໍາ
meaning list.sentence: She studied architecture at university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮຽນສະຖາປັດຕະຍະ ກຳ ຢູ່ໃນມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ.

meaning list.sentence: They argued about the best way to solve the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ໂຕ້ຖຽງກັນກ່ຽວກັບວິທີທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດເພື່ອແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຕ້ຖຽງ, ໂຕ້ຖຽງ
meaning list.sentence: They had an argument over politics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ສົນທະນາກ່ຽວກັບການເມືອງ.

meaning list.sentence: He served in the army for five years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮັບໃຊ້ຢູ່ໃນກອງທັບເປັນເວລາຫ້າປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຈັດ, ປັບ
meaning list.sentence: Can you arrange a meeting for next week?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດຈັດກອງປະຊຸມສໍາລັບອາທິດຕໍ່ໄປໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ດັດ​ແກ້​, ການ​ປັບ​ປຸງ​
meaning list.sentence: We have made all the arrangements for the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ຈັດ​ການ​ທັງ​ຫມົດ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ການ​ພັກ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຄື (ຄຳສຸພາສິດ)
meaning list.sentence: He works as a teacher.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກເປັນຄູສອນ.

meaning list.meaning: -as (ການ​ເຊື່ອມ​ຕໍ່​)
meaning list.sentence: Do it as I told you.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮັດຕາມທີ່ຂ້ອຍບອກເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: The baby is fast asleep.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍນອນໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຊ່ວຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He works as an assistant in a law firm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກເປັນຜູ້ຊ່ວຍໃນບໍລິສັດກົດຫມາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວຊ່ວຍ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The assistant manager helped solve the issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊ່ວຍຜູ້ຈັດການໄດ້ຊ່ວຍແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາ.

meaning list.sentence: She is a professional athlete.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນນັກກິລາມືອາຊີບ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຈມຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The city suffered a major attack last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເມືອງ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ໂຈມ​ຕີ​ຄັ້ງ​ໃຫຍ່​ໃນ​ຄືນ​ຜ່ານ​ມາ.

meaning list.sentence: The dog attacked the intruder.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມາໄດ້ໂຈມຕີ intruder ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເຂົ້າຮ່ວມ
meaning list.sentence: She plans to attend the meeting tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.sentence: Pay attention to the teacher’s instructions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເອົາ​ໃຈ​ໃສ່​ກັບ​ຄໍາ​ແນະ​ນໍາ​ຂອງ​ຄູ​ອາ​ຈານ​.

meaning list.meaning: ລະວັງ (ອຸທານ)
meaning list.sentence: Attention! Please step back.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເອົາໃຈໃສ່! ກະລຸນາຖອຍຫຼັງ.

meaning list.sentence: She is very attractive in that dress.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງເບິ່ງເປັນທີ່ດຶງດູດຫຼາຍໃນເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງນັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຟັງ, ຜູ້ຟັງ
meaning list.sentence: The audience clapped enthusiastically.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊົມໄດ້ຕົບມືຢ່າງກະຕືລືລົ້ນ.

meaning list.sentence: The author signed copies of her book.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຂຽນໄດ້ເຊັນສໍາເນົາຫນັງສືຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີ, ເຫມາະສົມ
meaning list.sentence: The manager is not available at the moment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການບໍ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ໃນເວລານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເລ່ຍ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The average temperature in summer is 30°C.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸນຫະພູມສະເລ່ຍໃນລະດູຮ້ອນແມ່ນ 30 ອົງສາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເລ່ຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her grades are above average.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊັ້ນຮຽນຂອງລາວແມ່ນສູງກວ່າສະເລ່ຍ.

meaning list.sentence: He tries to avoid eating junk food.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມຫຼີກເວັ້ນການກິນອາຫານ junk.

meaning list.sentence: She won an award for her performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນສໍາລັບການສະແດງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ຮ້າຍ, ຂີ້ຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: The weather was awful yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາກາດແມ່ນຂີ້ຮ້າຍມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຈັດການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The manager is responsible for the project's success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການແມ່ນຮັບຜິດຊອບຕໍ່ຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ແບບ, ທັດສະນະຄະຕິ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His manner was calm and respectful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັດສະນະຂອງລາວແມ່ນສະຫງົບແລະເຄົາລົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝາຍ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Please mark the correct answer on the sheet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາໝາຍຄຳຕອບທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງໃສ່ໃນເຈ້ຍ.

meaning list.sentence: There was a mark on the wall where the picture had been.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີປ້າຍຢູ່ເທິງຝາບ່ອນທີ່ຮູບຖືກແຂວນ.

meaning list.sentence: They decided to marry in the summer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າຕັດສິນໃຈແຕ່ງງານໃນລະດູຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ວັດສະດຸ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The building was constructed with high-quality materials.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານໄດ້ຖືກກໍ່ສ້າງດ້ວຍວັດສະດຸທີ່ມີຄຸນນະພາບສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄະນິດສາດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She excels in mathematics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດຫຼາຍໃນຄະນິດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄະນິດສາດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Maths is her favorite subject.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນິດສາດເປັນວິຊາທີ່ລາວມັກ.

meaning list.sentence: This is a serious matter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນເລື່ອງທີ່ຮ້າຍແຮງ.

meaning list.sentence: It doesn't matter what others think.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນບໍ່ສໍາຄັນວ່າຄົນອື່ນຄິດແນວໃດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນ​ໄປ​ໄດ້ (modal verb​)
meaning list.sentence: You may leave early if you finish your work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າເຈົ້າສຳເລັດວຽກຂອງເຈົ້າ ເຈົ້າສາມາດອອກກ່ອນໄດ້.

meaning list.sentence: The news spread quickly through the media.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ແຜ່​ລາມ​ອອກ​ສູ່​ສື່​ມວນ​ຊົນ​ຢ່າງ​ວ່ອງ​ໄວ.

meaning list.sentence: She works in the medical field.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກໃນດ້ານການແພດ.

meaning list.sentence: You should take your medicine twice a day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນກິນຢາຂອງທ່ານສອງເທື່ອຕໍ່ມື້.

meaning list.sentence: Her memory of the event is still vivid.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຊົງຈໍາຂອງລາວກ່ຽວກັບເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວຍັງສົດໃສ.

meaning list.sentence: Did she mention the meeting?
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ກ່າວເຖິງກອງປະຊຸມບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: The sculpture is made of metal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບປັ້ນແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍໂລຫະ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິທີການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They are testing a new method to improve results.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາກໍາລັງພະຍາຍາມວິທີການໃຫມ່ເພື່ອປັບປຸງຜົນໄດ້ຮັບ.

meaning list.sentence: He stood in the middle of the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢືນຢູ່ກາງຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປານກາງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The middle child often feels overlooked.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກກາງມັກຈະຮູ້ສຶກຖືກມອງຂ້າມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ modal)
meaning list.sentence: It might rain later today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມື້ນີ້ອາດມີຝົນຕົກ.

meaning list.sentence: Her mind was full of questions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈິດໃຈຂອງລາວເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍຄໍາຖາມ.

meaning list.sentence: Would you mind closing the door?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດປິດປະຕູໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: This book is mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມນີ້ແມ່ນຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.sentence: She looked at herself in the mirror.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເບິ່ງຕົວເອງໃນກະຈົກ.

meaning list.meaning: ລືມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The missing keys were found under the sofa.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະແຈທີ່ຂາດຫາຍໄປໄດ້ຖືກພົບເຫັນພາຍໃຕ້ໂຊຟາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແບບພົກພາ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The mobile phone has revolutionized communication.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂທລະສັບມືຖືໄດ້ປະຕິວັດການສື່ສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂທລະສັບມືຖື
meaning list.sentence: She answered the call on her mobile.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮັບສາຍໃນໂທລະສັບມືຖືຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: The monkey climbed the tree quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລິງໄດ້ປີນຕົ້ນໄມ້ຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.sentence: The full moon lit up the night sky.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດວງຈັນເຕັມດວງເຮັດໃຫ້ທ້ອງຟ້າໃນຕອນກາງຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນຫຼາຍແມ່ນ
meaning list.sentence: The audience was mostly children.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊົມສ່ວນຫຼາຍແມ່ນເດັກນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.sentence: He bought a new motorcycle last week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ລົດຈັກໃຫມ່ໃນອາທິດທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ
meaning list.sentence: The movement of the dancers was graceful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວຂອງນັກເຕັ້ນລໍາມີຄວາມສະຫງ່າງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ດົນ​ຕີ
meaning list.sentence: She has a great musical talent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີພອນສະຫວັນດົນຕີທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.sentence: The musician played the piano beautifully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ດົນ​ຕີ​ໄດ້​ຫຼິ້ນ piano ໄດ້​ງາມ​ຫຼາຍ​.

meaning list.sentence: I made the cake myself.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍເຮັດເຄ້ກດ້ວຍຕົວເອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຄບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The street is too narrow for large trucks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖະໜົນຫົນທາງແຄບເກີນໄປສຳລັບລົດບັນທຸກໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.sentence: The national anthem was played before the game.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເພງຊາດໄດ້ຖືກຫຼີ້ນກ່ອນການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.sentence: We should protect nature for future generations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງປົກປັກຮັກສາທໍາມະຊາດໃຫ້ຄົນລຸ້ນຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.sentence: She nearly missed the train.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເກືອບພາດລົດໄຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳເປັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It's necessary to wear a helmet while riding a bike.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງໃສ່ຫມວກກັນກະທົບໃນຂະນະທີ່ຂີ່ລົດຖີບ.

meaning list.sentence: She wore a scarf around her neck.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໃສ່​ຜ້າ​ພັນ​ຄໍ​ຮອບ​ຄໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ອງການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There is a great need for clean water in the area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມຕ້ອງການນ້ໍາສະອາດຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນພາກພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມີ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Neither of the answers is correct.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ມີຄໍາຕອບທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສາດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She felt nervous before her presentation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກປະສາດກ່ອນການນໍາສະເຫນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄືອຂ່າຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company uses a secure network for communication.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໃຊ້ເຄືອຂ່າຍທີ່ປອດໄພສໍາລັບການສື່ສານ.

meaning list.sentence: The noise from the construction was unbearable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງຂອງການກໍ່ສ້າງແມ່ນບໍ່ສາມາດທົນໄດ້.

meaning list.sentence: The children were very noisy during the game.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍມີສຽງດັງຫຼາຍໃນລະຫວ່າງເກມ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມີ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: None of the guests arrived on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ມີແຂກຄົນໃດມາຮອດຕາມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳມະດາ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This is a normal result for this kind of test.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນຜົນປົກກະຕິສໍາລັບການທົດສອບປະເພດນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: She normally gets up at 7 AM.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປົກກະຕິລາວຕື່ນແຕ່ 7 ໂມງເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: Did you notice the change in her behavior?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສັງເກດເຫັນການປ່ຽນແປງໃນພຶດຕິກໍາຂອງລາວບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: There was a notice about the event on the board.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການປະກາດກ່ຽວກັບເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວຢູ່ໃນຄະນະ.

meaning list.sentence: She is reading a fascinating novel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກຳລັງອ່ານນິຍາຍທີ່ໜ້າສົນໃຈ.

meaning list.sentence: We searched everywhere, but it was nowhere to be found.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ຊອກ​ຫາ​ຢູ່​ທົ່ວ​ທຸກ​ແຫ່ງ​, ແຕ່​ວ່າ​ມັນ​ບໍ່​ແມ່ນ​ບ່ອນ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ພົບ​ເຫັນ​.

meaning list.sentence: Please number the pages before submitting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາເລກໜ້າກ່ອນສົ່ງ.

meaning list.sentence: She added some nuts to the cake batter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເພີ່ມ hazelnuts ບາງອັນໃສ່ເຂົ້າຫນົມເຄັກ.

meaning list.sentence: They sailed across the ocean.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ແລ່ນຂ້າມມະຫາສະໝຸດ.

meaning list.sentence: He offered to help with the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ສະເຫນີໃຫ້ການຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອໃນໂຄງການ.

meaning list.sentence: The offer was too good to refuse.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ສະເໜີດີເກີນໄປທີ່ຈະປະຕິເສດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າໜ້າທີ່, ພະນັກງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The officer directed traffic during the parade.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່ໄດ້ຊີ້ນໍາການຈະລາຈອນໃນລະຫວ່າງການຂະບວນແຫ່.

meaning list.sentence: He added some oil to the frying pan.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕື່ມນ້ໍາມັນບາງສ່ວນໃສ່ເຕົາຂົ້ວ.

meaning list.sentence: He jumped onto the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກະໂດດຢູ່ເທິງໂຕະ.

meaning list.sentence: This job offers a great opportunity for growth.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸລະກິດນີ້ສະເຫນີໂອກາດທີ່ດີສໍາລັບການເຕີບໂຕ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງເລືອກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You have the option to choose your seat.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານມີທາງເລືອກທີ່ຈະເລືອກເອົາບ່ອນນັ່ງຂອງທ່ານເອງ.

meaning list.sentence: It was just an ordinary day at the office.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນມື້ທໍາມະດາຢູ່ຫ້ອງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງ, ສະຖາບັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The organization helps homeless people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການນີ້ຊ່ວຍຄົນທີ່ບໍ່ມີທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັດລຽງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They organized a charity event last weekend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ຈັດ​ກິດ​ຈະ​ກໍາ​ການ​ກຸ​ສົນ​ໃນ​ທ້າຍ​ອາ​ທິດ​ຜ່ານ​ມາ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົ້ນສະບັບ, ຕົ້ນສະບັບ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The painting is an original work of art.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບແຕ້ມນີ້ແມ່ນສິລະປະຕົ້ນສະບັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວເຮົາເອງ
meaning list.sentence: We prepared the meal ourselves.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາກະກຽມອາຫານດ້ວຍຕົນເອງ.

meaning list.sentence: The car is parked outside the house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດແມ່ນຈອດຢູ່ນອກເຮືອນ.

meaning list.sentence: The outside of the building is very modern.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາຍນອກຂອງອາຄານແມ່ນທັນສະໄຫມຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາຍນອກ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They painted the outside walls white.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ທາສີຝາພາຍນອກເປັນສີຂາວ.

meaning list.sentence: She baked the cake in the oven.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອົບເຄ້ກໃນເຕົາອົບ.

meaning list.sentence: She owns a beautiful house by the lake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີເຮືອນທີ່ສວຍງາມຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບທະເລສາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າຂອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The owner of the shop is very friendly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຂອງຮ້ານແມ່ນເປັນມິດຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫໍ່ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She packed her suitcase for the trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ບັນຈຸກະເປົ໋າຂອງລາວສໍາລັບການເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຈັບປວດ, ຄວາມທຸກ
meaning list.sentence: He felt a sharp pain in his leg.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກເຈັບປວດແຫຼມຢູ່ໃນຂາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່າງທາສີ, ຊ່າງຍ້ອມສີ
meaning list.sentence: The painter is working on a new portrait.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊ່າງແຕ້ມຮູບກຳລັງເຮັດຮູບຄົນໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ພະລາດຊະວັງ
meaning list.sentence: The king lives in a grand palace.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະສັດອາໃສຢູ່ໃນວັງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.sentence: He bought a new pair of pants for work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຊື້​ໂສ້ງ​ຂາ​ຄູ່​ໃໝ່​ມາ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ບ່ອນຈອດລົດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Finding parking in the city is difficult.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນຍາກທີ່ຈະຊອກຫາບ່ອນຈອດລົດຢູ່ໃນຕົວເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເພາະ, ສະເພາະ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has a particular interest in art.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມສົນໃຈພິເສດໃນສິລະປະ.

meaning list.sentence: The train will pass through the tunnel soon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄຟຈະຜ່ານອຸໂມງໃນໄວໆນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: The passenger boarded the bus at the last stop.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ໂດຍສານໄດ້ຂຶ້ນລົດເມຢູ່ບ່ອນຈອດລົດສຸດທ້າຍ.

meaning list.sentence: In the past, people used candles for light.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນອະດີດ, ປະຊາຊົນໃຊ້ທຽນເພື່ອຄວາມສະຫວ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນເຈັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The patient is recovering well after surgery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຈັບແມ່ນຟື້ນຕົວດີຫຼັງຈາກການຜ່າຕັດ.

meaning list.sentence: The curtains have a beautiful floral pattern.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຮູບແບບດອກໄມ້ທີ່ສວຍງາມຢູ່ເທິງຜ້າມ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າທຳນຽມ, ການຈ່າຍເງິນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The workers received their pay on Friday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນງານໄດ້ຮັບເງິນເດືອນຂອງພວກເຂົາໃນວັນສຸກ.

meaning list.sentence: The treaty brought peace to the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສົນທິສັນຍາ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ນຳ​ເອົາ​ສັນຕິພາບ​ມາສູ່​ພາກ​ພື້ນ.

meaning list.sentence: He found a penny on the ground.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ພົບ​ເງິນ​ກ້ອນ​ໜຶ່ງ​ຢູ່​ເທິງ​ໜ້າ​ດິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫົວ, ແຕ່ລະ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The tickets cost $20 per person.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປີ້ແມ່ນ $20 ຕໍ່ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີເຊັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Ten per cent of the income is donated to charity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສິບສ່ວນຮ້ອຍຂອງລາຍຮັບແມ່ນບໍລິຈາກໃຫ້ແກ່ການກຸສົນ.

meaning list.sentence: The band will perform live tonight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວົງດົນຕີຈະສະແດງສົດໃນຄືນນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: Perhaps it will rain later.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບາງທີມັນອາດຈະມີຝົນຕົກຕໍ່ມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ອະ​ນຸ​ຍາດ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: You need permission to access this file.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການສິດອະນຸຍາດເພື່ອເຂົ້າເຖິງໄຟລ໌ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ບຸກຄະລິກກະພາບ
meaning list.sentence: She has a friendly and outgoing personality.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີບຸກຄະລິກກະພາບທີ່ເປັນມິດແລະໂດດເດັ່ນ.

meaning list.sentence: They have a pet dog named Max.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າມີໝາສັດລ້ຽງຊື່ Max.

meaning list.meaning: ນ້ຳມັນເຊື້ອໄຟ
meaning list.sentence: The car runs on petrol.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດແລ່ນດ້ວຍນ້ຳມັນແອັດຊັງ.

meaning list.sentence: She loves to photograph nature scenes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຖ່າຍຮູບທິວທັດທຳມະຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງກາຍ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Regular physical exercise is important for health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍເປັນປົກກະຕິແມ່ນສໍາຄັນຕໍ່ສຸຂະພາບ.

meaning list.sentence: Physics explains how the universe works.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຟີຊິກອະທິບາຍວິທີການເຮັດວຽກຂອງຈັກກະວານ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເລືອກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: You can pick any book you like.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ສາ​ມາດ​ເລືອກ​ເອົາ​ຫນັງ​ສື​ທີ່​ທ່ານ​ຕ້ອງ​ການ​.

meaning list.sentence: She went to the garden to pick flowers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄປສວນເພື່ອເກັບດອກໄມ້.

meaning list.sentence: The pilot safely landed the plane.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກບິນໄດ້ລົງຈອດຍົນຢ່າງປອດໄພ.

meaning list.sentence: Earth is the third planet from the sun.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລກແມ່ນດາວເຄາະທີສາມຈາກດວງອາທິດ.

meaning list.sentence: She decided to plant a tree in her garden.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັດສິນໃຈປູກຕົ້ນໄມ້ຢູ່ໃນສວນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: The bottle is made of plastic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແກ້ວແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍພາດສະຕິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາດສະຕິກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She bought a plastic container for storage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເອົາພາຊະນະພາດສະຕິກສໍາລັບການເກັບຮັກສາ.

meaning list.sentence: He served the food on a white plate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮັບໃຊ້ອາຫານໃນຈານສີຂາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວທີ, ເວທີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The train arrived at platform 3.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄຟມາຮອດເວທີເລກ 3.

meaning list.sentence: He always tries to please everyone around him.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມເຮັດໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນທີ່ຢູ່ອ້ອມຂ້າງລາວພໍໃຈ.

meaning list.sentence: She was pleased with the results of her work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພໍໃຈກັບຜົນຂອງການເຮັດວຽກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: He put the keys in his pocket.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເອົາກະແຈໃສ່ໃນຖົງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸພາບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is always polite to his teachers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມສຸພາບສະເໝີຕໍ່ຄູສອນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: Air pollution is a major concern in big cities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມົນລະພິດທາງອາກາດເປັນບັນຫາໃຫຍ່ຢູ່ໃນຕົວເມືອງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເພງປັອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She loves listening to pop music.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຟັງເພງປັອບ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິຍົມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This song is very pop among teenagers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເພງ​ນີ້​ເປັນ​ທີ່​ນິ​ຍົມ​ຫຼາຍ​ຂອງ​ໄວ​ຫນຸ່ມ​.

meaning list.sentence: The city's population has grown rapidly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາກອນຂອງເມືອງເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕຳແໜ່ງ, ຕຳແໜ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She applied for a managerial position.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ສະຫມັກຕໍາແຫນ່ງຜູ້ຈັດການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັບສິນ, ເຈົ້າຂອງ
meaning list.sentence: This book is one of my most valued possessions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມຫົວນີ້ແມ່ນຫນຶ່ງໃນການຄອບຄອງທີ່ມີຄຸນຄ່າທີ່ສຸດຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There is a possibility of rain tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້ຂອງຝົນໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂປສເຕີ, ໂປສເຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She hung a movie poster on her bedroom wall.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແຂວນໂປສເຕີຮູບເງົາຢູ່ເທິງຝາຫ້ອງນອນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະລັງງານ, ພະລັງງານ
meaning list.sentence: The country relies on solar power for energy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ພະລັງງານແສງຕາເວັນສໍາລັບພະລັງງານ.

meaning list.sentence: Scientists predict that the temperatures will rise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດຄາດຄະເນວ່າອຸນຫະພູມຈະເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນຳສະເໜີ, ນຳສະເໜີ
meaning list.sentence: The student presented her research to the class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສຶກສາໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີການຄົ້ນຄວ້າຂອງຕົນຕໍ່ຫ້ອງຮຽນ.

meaning list.sentence: The president of the company announced the new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະທານບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປະກາດນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່.

meaning list.sentence: Wearing a helmet can prevent head injuries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໃສ່ຫມວກກັນກະທົບສາມາດປ້ອງກັນການບາດເຈັບທີ່ຫົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She printed the document before the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພິມເອກະສານກ່ອນກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງພິມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The printer is out of ink.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງພິມບໍ່ມີຫມຶກ.

meaning list.sentence: The criminal was sent to prison for ten years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະດີອາຍາໄດ້ຖືກຕັດສິນໂທດຈໍາຄຸກສິບປີ.

meaning list.sentence: She won the first prize in the competition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນທໍາອິດໃນການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະບວນການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hiring process takes about two weeks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະບວນການຮັບສະໝັກພະນັກງານໃຊ້ເວລາປະມານສອງອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜະລິດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: This factory produces high-quality furniture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານນີ້ຜະລິດເຄື່ອງເຟີນີເຈີທີ່ມີຄຸນນະພາບສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ມືອາຊີບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a professional photographer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຊ່າງພາບມືອາຊີບ.

meaning list.sentence: The professor gave a lecture on modern history.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາດສະດາຈານໄດ້ບັນຍາຍກ່ຽວກັບປະຫວັດສາດທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂປຣໄຟລ໌ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She updated her profile picture on social media.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອັບເດດຮູບຂອງລາວໃນສື່ສັງຄົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂປຣແກຣມ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: The new software program is easy to use.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການຊອບແວໃຫມ່ແມ່ນງ່າຍທີ່ຈະນໍາໃຊ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຄືບໜ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The team has made significant progress this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານໄດ້ມີຄວາມຄືບຫນ້າຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: He promised to help with the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສັນຍາວ່າຈະຊ່ວຍໃນໂຄງການ.

meaning list.sentence: She kept her promise to visit us.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ຮັກສາຄໍາສັນຍາຂອງພຣະອົງທີ່ຈະໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.sentence: Can you pronounce this word for me?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດອອກສຽງຄຳນີ້ໃຫ້ຂ້ອຍໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: We must protect endangered species.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງປົກປ້ອງສັດປ່າທີ່ໃກ້ຈະສູນພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜອງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company provides health insurance for its employees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໃຫ້ປະກັນໄພສຸຂະພາບແກ່ພະນັກງານຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ານອາຫານ, ບາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They met at the pub after work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ພົບກັນຢູ່ tavern ຫຼັງຈາກການເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາທາລະນະ, ເປີດໃຫ້ສາທາລະນະ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The park is open to the public.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສວນສາທາລະນະແມ່ນເປີດໃຫ້ສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.sentence: The public showed great interest in the exhibition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາຊົນໄດ້ສະແດງຄວາມສົນໃຈຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍຕໍ່ງານວາງສະແດງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຜີຍແຜ່ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The author plans to publish his new book next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຂຽນວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະພິມປື້ມໃຫມ່ຂອງລາວໃນເດືອນຫນ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: She pulled the door open with difficulty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປີດປະຕູດ້ວຍຄວາມຍາກລໍາບາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດປະສົງ, ຈຸດປະສົງ
meaning list.sentence: The purpose of this meeting is to discuss future plans.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈຸດປະສົງຂອງກອງປະຊຸມຄັ້ງນີ້ ແມ່ນເພື່ອປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບແຜນການໃນຕໍ່ໜ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: He pushed the cart down the aisle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຍູ້​ລົດ​ເຂັນ​ລົງ​ຈາກ​ຫ້ອງ​ໂຖງ.

meaning list.sentence: The quality of this product is excellent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຸນນະພາບຂອງຜະລິດຕະພັນນີ້ແມ່ນດີເລີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະລິມານ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They ordered a large quantity of supplies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ສັ່ງ​ຊື້​ອຸ​ປະ​ກອນ​ຈໍາ​ນວນ​ຫຼາຍ​.

meaning list.sentence: The queen addressed the nation on television.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະລາຊິນີກ່າວຕໍ່ປະເທດຊາດທາງໂທລະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາຖາມ, ຖາມຄໍາຖາມ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher questioned the students about the topic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູຖາມນັກຮຽນກ່ຽວກັບວິຊາ.

meaning list.sentence: She entered the room quietly so as not to wake the baby.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຂົ້າໄປໃນຫ້ອງຢ່າງງຽບໆເພື່ອບໍ່ໃຫ້ລູກຕື່ນ.

meaning list.sentence: He won the 100-meter race.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊະນະການແຂ່ງຂັນ 100 ແມັດ.

meaning list.sentence: They raced to see who could finish first.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ແຂ່ງຂັນ​ກັນ​ເບິ່ງ​ວ່າ​ໃຜ​ຈະ​ຈົບ​ກ່ອນ.

meaning list.sentence: The railway connects the two cities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທາງລົດໄຟເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ທັງສອງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົກສູງ, ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The company decided to raise salaries this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈເພີ່ມເງິນເດືອນໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດຕາ, ຄວາມໄວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The unemployment rate has decreased significantly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອັດຕາການຫວ່າງງານໄດ້ຫຼຸດລົງຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.sentence: The film was rather interesting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາແມ່ນຫນ້າສົນໃຈດີ.

meaning list.sentence: She reached the top of the mountain after a long climb.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາຍຫຼັງ​ປີນ​ຂຶ້ນ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ດົນ​ນານ, ລາວ​ໄດ້​ໄປ​ຮອດ​ຍອດ​ພູ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິກິລິຍາ
meaning list.sentence: How did he react to the news?
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີປະຕິກິລິຍາແນວໃດຕໍ່ຂ່າວ?

meaning list.sentence: She realized the mistake too late.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ຄວາມຜິດພາດຂອງລາວຊ້າເກີນໄປ.

meaning list.sentence: I received your letter yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍໄດ້ຮັບຈົດໝາຍຂອງເຈົ້າມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: The recent developments are encouraging.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການພັດທະນາທີ່ຜ່ານມາມີແນວໂນ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫວ່າງມໍ່ໆນີ້
meaning list.sentence: I have recently started learning Spanish.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອບໍ່ດົນມານີ້ຂ້ອຍເລີ່ມຮຽນພາສາສະເປນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ອນຮັບ, ຕ້ອນຮັບ
meaning list.sentence: The hotel reception is open 24 hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງການຕ້ອນຮັບຂອງໂຮງແຮມເປີດ 24 ຊົ່ວໂມງຕໍ່ມື້.

meaning list.sentence: She followed a recipe to bake the cake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຕິບັດຕາມສູດການອົບເຄັກ.

meaning list.sentence: Do you recognize this song?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຮູ້ຈັກເພງນີ້ບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: Can you recommend a good restaurant nearby?
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດແນະນໍາຮ້ານອາຫານທີ່ດີຢູ່ໃກ້ໆໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.sentence: The record of the meeting was stored securely.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການບັນທຶກການປະຊຸມໄດ້ຖືກເກັບຮັກສາໄວ້ຢ່າງປອດໄພ.

meaning list.sentence: He recorded the lecture for later review.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ບັນທຶກການບັນຍາຍເພື່ອທົບທວນຄືນຕໍ່ມາ.

meaning list.sentence: The recording of the concert was excellent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການບັນທຶກຂອງຄອນເສີດແມ່ນດີເລີດ.

meaning list.sentence: We should recycle paper to save trees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ຕ້ອງ​ນຳ​ໃຊ້​ເຈ້ຍ​ໃໝ່​ເພື່ອ​ປົກ​ປ້ອງ​ຕົ້ນ​ໄມ້.

meaning list.sentence: The company aims to reduce waste by 50%.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດຕັ້ງເປົ້າຫຼຸດຜ່ອນສິ່ງເສດເຫຼືອ 50%.

meaning list.meaning: ອ້າງເຖິງ, ຫມາຍເຖິງ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She referred to the report during her presentation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ອ້າງເຖິງບົດລາຍງານໃນລະຫວ່າງການນໍາສະເຫນີຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: He refused the offer to join the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປະຕິເສດການສະເຫນີທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າຮ່ວມທີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາກພື້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This region is famous for its wine production.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກພື້ນນີ້ມີຊື່ສຽງສໍາລັບການຜະລິດເຫຼົ້າແວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກກະຕິ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is a regular customer at this café.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນລູກຄ້າປະຈຳຂອງຮ້ານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສໍາພັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They have a good working relationship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າມີການພົວພັນການເຮັດວຽກທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາອອກ, ລົບອອກ
meaning list.sentence: She removed the old files from the shelf.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເອົາໄຟລ໌ເກົ່າອອກຈາກຊັ້ນວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສ້ອມແປງ
meaning list.sentence: He repaired the broken chair.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແກ້ໄຂເກົ້າອີ້ທີ່ແຕກຫັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນແທນ, ປ່ຽນແປງ
meaning list.sentence: We need to replace the old lightbulb.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງໄດ້ທົດແທນ bulb ເກົ່າ.

meaning list.sentence: She replied to the email immediately.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕອບອີເມວທັນທີ.

meaning list.sentence: His reply was short but clear.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາຕອບຂອງລາວແມ່ນສັ້ນແຕ່ຈະແຈ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຍງານ (ເຂົ້າຈີ່) (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He reported the incident to the police.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ລາຍງານເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວໃຫ້ຕໍາຫຼວດ.

meaning list.sentence: The reporter interviewed the famous actor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຂ່າວໄດ້ສໍາພາດນັກສະແດງທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງຂໍ, ຮ້ອງຂໍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She submitted a request for additional resources.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຍື່ນຄໍາຮ້ອງຂໍຊັບພະຍາກອນເພີ່ມເຕີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄົ້ນຄວ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The research focused on renewable energy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄົ້ນຄວ້າໄດ້ສຸມໃສ່ພະລັງງານທົດແທນ.

meaning list.sentence: She is researching climate change for her project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກໍາລັງເຮັດການຄົ້ນຄວ້າກ່ຽວກັບການປ່ຽນແປງດິນຟ້າອາກາດສໍາລັບໂຄງການຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກຄົ້ນຄວ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The researchers presented their findings at the conference.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຄົ້ນຄວ້າໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີຜົນການຄົ້ນພົບຂອງພວກເຂົາຢູ່ໃນກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.sentence: She responded to the question confidently.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕອບຄໍາຖາມຢ່າງໝັ້ນໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕອບ, ຕອບ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The response to the announcement was positive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຕອບ​ສະ​ຫນອງ​ຕໍ່​ການ​ປະ​ກາດ​ແມ່ນ​ໃນ​ທາງ​ບວກ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນທີ່ຍັງເຫຼືອ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He ate the rest of the pizza.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກິນ pizza ສ່ວນທີ່ເຫຼືອ.

meaning list.sentence: She decided to rest after a long day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກມື້ດົນນານ, ລາວຕັດສິນໃຈພັກຜ່ອນ.

meaning list.sentence: He needs a good rest after the trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕ້ອງການພັກຜ່ອນທີ່ດີຫຼັງຈາກເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການວິພາກວິຈານ (noun)
meaning list.sentence: The movie received positive reviews from critics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາໄດ້ຮັບການທົບທວນຄືນໃນທາງບວກຈາກນັກວິຈານ.

meaning list.sentence: She reviewed the document carefully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວທົບທວນເອກະສານຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂຶ້ນຍົນ, ການເດີນທາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The roller coaster ride was thrilling.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂັບເຄື່ອນ roller coaster ແມ່ນຕື່ນເຕັ້ນ.

meaning list.sentence: He bought her a diamond ring.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ແຫວນເພັດໃຫ້ນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຽງດັງ (ໂທລະສັບ/ກະດິ່ງ) (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The phone rang several times, but no one answered.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂທລະສັບດັງຫຼາຍຄັ້ງ ແຕ່ບໍ່ມີໃຜຕອບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ, ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The sun rises in the east.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດວງອາທິດຂຶ້ນຈາກທິດຕາເວັນອອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫີນ, ຫີນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He threw a small rock into the river.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຖິ້ມ​ກ້ອນ​ຫີນ​ນ້ອຍໆ​ລົງ​ໄປ​ໃນ​ແມ່ນໍ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: He is a fan of classic rock music.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນແຟນເພງຣັອກຄລາດສິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜ້າທີ່, ໜ້າທີ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He played a leading role in the movie.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກົດດັນ, ຄວາມກົດດັນ
meaning list.sentence: He has been under a lot of stress at work lately.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢູ່ພາຍໃຕ້ຄວາມກົດດັນຫຼາຍໃນການເຮັດວຽກບໍ່ດົນມານີ້.

meaning list.sentence: The teacher stressed the importance of punctuality.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູສອນເນັ້ນຄວາມສໍາຄັນຂອງການກົງຕໍ່ເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄງສ້າງ, ອາຄານ
meaning list.sentence: The Eiffel Tower is an iconic structure in Paris.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍ Eiffel ແມ່ນອາຄານທີ່ໂດດເດັ່ນໃນປາຣີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາສັ່ງ, ໂຄງສ້າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The report lacks a clear structure and is hard to follow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານຂາດໂຄງສ້າງທີ່ຊັດເຈນ ແລະຍາກທີ່ຈະປະຕິບັດຕາມ.

meaning list.sentence: That was a stupid mistake; I should have been more careful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນຄວາມຜິດພາດທີ່ໂງ່ຈ້າ; ຂ້ອຍຄວນລະມັດລະວັງຫຼາຍກວ່ານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ຫມາຍ​, imlogical (ຄຸນ​ສົມ​ບັດ​)
meaning list.sentence: It's a stupid rule that doesn't make any sense.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນກົດລະບຽບທີ່ໂງ່ທີ່ບໍ່ມີຄວາມຫມາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສົບຜົນສຳເລັດ, ປະສົບຜົນສຳເລັດ
meaning list.sentence: She worked hard to succeed in her exams.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຮັດວຽກຫນັກເພື່ອປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດໃນການສອບເສັງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສໍາເລັດ, ສໍາເລັດ
meaning list.sentence: The prince succeeded his father as king.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຊາຍໄດ້ສືບທອດພໍ່ຂອງລາວເປັນກະສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳເລັດຜົນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company has been very successful in recent years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດຫຼາຍໃນຊຸມປີທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊັ່ນ, ປະເພດນີ້ (ຄຳນາມ/ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: I have never seen such a beautiful sunset.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ເຄີຍເຫັນຕາເວັນຕົກທີ່ສວຍງາມແບບນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ນັ້ນ​ແມ່ນ​ມັນ​, ເຊັ່ນ​ວ່າ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ / adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: Why do you make such a big deal out of it?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປັນ​ຫຍັງ​ເຈົ້າ​ຈຶ່ງ​ເຮັດ​ເລື່ອງ​ໃຫຍ່​ໃນ​ເລື່ອງ​ນີ້?

meaning list.meaning: ທັນໃດນັ້ນ, ທັນໃດນັ້ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The car suddenly stopped in the middle of the road.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດກະທັນຫັນ ຢຸດຢູ່ກາງທາງ.

meaning list.sentence: I suggest we take a break and have some coffee.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຂໍແນະ ນຳ ໃຫ້ພວກເຮົາພັກຜ່ອນແລະດື່ມກາເຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊີ້ບອກ, ຊີ້ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The evidence suggests that he was at the scene of the crime.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັກຖານສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນວ່າລາວຢູ່ໃນບ່ອນເກີດເຫດຂອງອາຊະຍາກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳແນະນຳ, ຄຳແນະນຳ
meaning list.sentence: She made a helpful suggestion during the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄໍາແນະນໍາທີ່ເປັນປະໂຫຍດໃນລະຫວ່າງການປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເວົ້າ, ຄວາມຫມາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a suggestion of doubt in his voice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຂໍ້ສົງໄສໃນສຽງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: He wore a black suit to the wedding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃສ່ຊຸດສີດໍາໄປງານແຕ່ງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄະດີ, ການດຳເນີນຄະດີ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company filed a suit against the supplier for breach of contract.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຟ້ອງຜູ້ສະຫນອງສໍາລັບການລະເມີດສັນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: We need to support local businesses during hard times.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງສະຫນັບສະຫນູນທຸລະກິດທ້ອງຖິ່ນໃນເວລາທີ່ມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອ, ຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອ
meaning list.sentence: Her family gave her emotional support during the crisis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອບຄົວ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້ການ​ສະໜັບສະໜູນ​ທາງ​ດ້ານ​ຈິດ​ໃຈ​ແກ່​ລາວ​ໃນ​ໄລຍະ​ວິກິດ​ການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມມຸດ, ສົມມຸດ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: I suppose you are right about the decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍສົມມຸດວ່າເຈົ້າເວົ້າຖືກຕ້ອງກ່ຽວກັບການຕັດສິນໃຈ.

meaning list.sentence: You are supposed to finish your homework before dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງເຮັດສໍາເລັດວຽກບ້ານຂອງເຈົ້າກ່ອນຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ, ແນ່ນອນ
meaning list.sentence: Are you sure this is the right address?
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານແນ່ໃຈບໍ່ວ່າທີ່ຢູ່ນີ້ຖືກຕ້ອງ?

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ, ແນ່ນອນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Sure, I can help you with your project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນ່ນອນ, ຂ້ອຍສາມາດຊ່ວຍເຈົ້າໃນໂຄງການຂອງເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຫລາດໃຈ, ປະຫລາດໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: Her birthday party was a wonderful surprise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານ​ລ້ຽງ​ວັນ​ເກີດ​ເປັນ​ການ​ແປກ​ໃຈ​ທີ່​ປະ​ເສີດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ແປກໃຈ, ແປກໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: We surprised her with a gift on her special day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາແປກໃຈລາວດ້ວຍຂອງຂວັນໃນມື້ພິເສດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: I was surprised by how quickly he finished the task.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​ຕົກ​ຕະ​ລຶງ​ໃນ​ການ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ທີ່​ລາວ​ສໍາ​ເລັດ​ໄວ​ປານ​ໃດ​.

meaning list.sentence: It’s surprising how well she adapted to the new environment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນເລື່ອງແປກທີ່ລາວປັບຕົວເຂົ້າກັບສະພາບແວດລ້ອມໃຫມ່ໄດ້ດີປານໃດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຫຼວດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company conducted a survey to understand customer preferences.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ດໍາເນີນການສໍາຫຼວດກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມມັກຂອງລູກຄ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົ້ນຄ້ວາ, ສືບສວນ
meaning list.sentence: The geological survey revealed valuable information about the area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສໍາຫຼວດທໍລະນີສາດໄດ້ເປີດເຜີຍຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ມີຄຸນຄ່າກ່ຽວກັບພື້ນທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຫວານ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This cake is so sweet, it’s delicious.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄັກນີ້ຫວານຫຼາຍ, ແຊບແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜ້າຮັກ, ໜ້າຮັກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has such a sweet personality that everyone loves her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີບຸກຄະລິກກະພາບທີ່ງາມທີ່ທຸກຄົນຮັກລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າໜົມຫວານ
meaning list.sentence: The children bought some sweets from the shop.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ຊື້ເຂົ້າຫນົມອົມຈາກຮ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍາລັກ, ສັນຍາລັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The heart is a universal symbol of love.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫົວໃຈເປັນສັນຍາລັກຂອງຄວາມຮັກທົ່ວໄປ.

meaning list.sentence: The flag serves as a symbol of unity for the nation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸງ​ຊາດ​ເປັນ​ສັນ​ຍາ​ລັກ​ແຫ່ງ​ຄວາມ​ສາ​ມັກ​ຄີ​ຂອງ​ປະ​ເທດ​ຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະບົບ, ຄໍາສັ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new transportation system has improved the city’s traffic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະບົບການຂົນສົ່ງໃຫມ່ປັບປຸງການສັນຈອນຂອງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄງສ້າງລັດຖະທຳມະນູນ
meaning list.sentence: Her immune system is strong enough to fight off the infection.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະບົບພູມຕ້ານທານແມ່ນແຂງແຮງພຽງພໍທີ່ຈະຕໍ່ສູ້ກັບການຕິດເຊື້ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອມພິວເຕີແທັບເລັດ
meaning list.sentence: He bought a new tablet for reading e-books.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊື້ແທັບເລັດໃໝ່ເພື່ອອ່ານປຶ້ມອີບຸກ.

meaning list.sentence: The doctor prescribed two tablets a day for the pain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍສັ່ງໃຫ້ສອງເມັດຕໍ່ມື້ສໍາລັບຄວາມເຈັບປວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສົນທະນາ, ການສົນທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: They had a long talk about their future plans.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ລົມກັນຢ່າງຍາວນານກ່ຽວກັບແຜນການໃນອະນາຄົດຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ກອງປະຊຸມ, ການສົນທະນາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She gave an inspiring talk on environmental issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ກ່າວ​ຄຳ​ປາ​ໄສ​ທີ່​ດົນ​ໃຈ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ບັນຫາ​ສິ່ງ​ແວດ​ລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປົ້າໝາຍ, ຈຸດປະສົງ
meaning list.sentence: The company failed to meet its sales target this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດບໍ່ບັນລຸເປົ້າຫມາຍການຂາຍໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດໝາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He hit the target with his first arrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕີເປົ້າ ໝາຍ ດ້ວຍລູກສອນ ທຳ ອິດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ວຽກ, ວຽກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Completing this task will require teamwork.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສໍາເລັດພາລະກິດນີ້ຈະຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີການເຮັດວຽກເປັນທີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົດຊາດ, ລົດຊາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The soup has a rich and spicy taste.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແກງມີລົດຊາດທີ່ອຸດົມສົມບູນແລະເຜັດ.

meaning list.sentence: She tasted the cake to see if it was sweet enough.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຊີມເຄັກເພື່ອເບິ່ງວ່າມັນຫວານພໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສອນ, ການຝຶກອົບຮົມ
meaning list.sentence: She has been involved in teaching for over ten years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມໃນການສອນຫຼາຍກວ່າສິບປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕັກ​ໂນ​ໂລ​ຊີ
meaning list.sentence: Modern technology has transformed communication.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຕັກໂນໂລຊີທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມໄດ້ຫັນປ່ຽນການສື່ສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ໄວ​ລຸ້ນ​, ໄວ​ຫນຸ່ມ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: Teenage years can be both challenging and rewarding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປີໄວລຸ້ນສາມາດເປັນທັງສິ່ງທ້າທາຍແລະລາງວັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸນຫະພູມ, ຄວາມຮ້ອນ
meaning list.sentence: The temperature dropped below freezing last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ ອຸນຫະພູມຫຼຸດລົງຕໍ່າກວ່າຄວາມເຢັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຂ້ (ພະຍາດ) (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has a high temperature and needs to see a doctor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີອາການໄຂ້ສູງ ແລະຕ້ອງໄປພົບແພດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳສັບ, ຄຳນາມ
meaning list.sentence: This scientific term is difficult to understand.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາສັບວິທະຍາສາດນີ້ແມ່ນຍາກທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລຍະເວລາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The school term starts in September.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສົກຮຽນເລີ່ມຕົ້ນໃນເດືອນກັນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ່ງຂໍ້ຄວາມ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She texted me to let me know she’d be late.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ສົ່ງຂໍ້ຄວາມຫາຂ້ອຍເພື່ອແຈ້ງໃຫ້ຂ້ອຍຮູ້ວ່າລາວຈະຊ້າ.

meaning list.sentence: They cooked the meal themselves without any help.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ປຸງ​ແຕ່ງ​ອາ​ຫານ​ດ້ວຍ​ຕົນ​ເອງ​ໂດຍ​ບໍ່​ມີ​ການ​ຊ່ວຍ​ເຫຼືອ​.

meaning list.meaning: ໜາ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book is so thick that it’s hard to carry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມແມ່ນຫນາຫຼາຍ, ມັນຍາກທີ່ຈະເອົາ.

meaning list.sentence: The fog was so thick we couldn’t see the road.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝອກ​ໜາ​ຫຼາຍ​ທີ່​ເຮົາ​ບໍ່​ສາມາດ​ເຫັນ​ຖະໜົນ​ຫົນທາງ.

meaning list.sentence: The thief was caught by the police last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຈນໄດ້ຖືກຈັບໂດຍຕໍາຫຼວດໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.sentence: She prefers wearing thin jackets in spring.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກໃສ່ເສື້ອກັນ ໜາວ ບາງໆໃນພາກຮຽນ spring.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນ, ອ່ອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: After being sick, he looked pale and thin.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເບິ່ງ​ຄື​ວ່າ​ຈືດໆ​ແລະ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ກ້າ​ຫານ​ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ທີ່​ລາວ​ເຈັບ​ປ່ວຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຄິດ, ຄວາມຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: Her thinking on the issue has evolved over time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຄິດຂອງລາວກ່ຽວກັບເລື່ອງນີ້ໄດ້ພັດທະນາໄປຕາມການເວລາ.

meaning list.sentence: She finished the race in third place.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈົບການແຂ່ງຂັນໃນອັນດັບສາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຄິດ, ຄວາມຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: Her thoughts were focused on the upcoming exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຄິດຂອງລາວໄດ້ສຸມໃສ່ການສອບເສັງທີ່ຈະມາເຖິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຕ່ຕອງ, ໄຕ່ຕອງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The poem invites deep thought about life and death.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດກະວີໄດ້ເຊື້ອເຊີນໃຫ້ສະທ້ອນເຖິງຊີວິດແລະຄວາມຕາຍຢ່າງເລິກເຊິ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖິ້ມ, ຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: He threw the ball across the yard.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໂຍນບານຂ້າມເດີ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະອາດ, ກະທັດຮັດ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: She always keeps her room tidy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງຂອງລາວມີຄວາມກະທັດຮັດສະເໝີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັດຕັ້ງ, ເກັບກຳ
meaning list.sentence: He tidied the books on the shelf.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈັດປຶ້ມໄວ້ເທິງຊັ້ນວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູກມັດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She tied the shoelaces tightly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ມັດ​ສາຍ​ເກີບ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ໃຫ້​ແໜ້ນ.

meaning list.sentence: He wore a red tie to the formal dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວນຸ່ງເສື້ອສີແດງໃສ່ຄ່ໍາຢ່າງເປັນທາງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາແນະນໍາ, ຄໍາແນະນໍາ
meaning list.sentence: She gave me some tips on how to improve my writing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄໍາແນະນໍາບາງຢ່າງກ່ຽວກັບວິທີປັບປຸງການຂຽນຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາຍ, ສ່ວນປາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The tip of the pen is broken.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປາຍປາກກາຖືກຫັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງມື, ເຄື່ອງມື (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A hammer is an essential tool for any carpenter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄມ້ຄ້ອນແມ່ນເຄື່ອງມືທີ່ຈໍາເປັນສໍາລັບຊ່າງໄມ້ທຸກໆຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິທີການ, ເຄື່ອງມື (ຄວາມຫມາຍນາມສະກຸນ) (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Education is a powerful tool for social change.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຶກສາເປັນເຄື່ອງມືທີ່ມີປະສິດທິພາບໃນການປ່ຽນແປງທາງສັງຄົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ພູ, ປະຊຸມສຸດຍອດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We reached the top of the mountain by noon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄປ​ຮອດ​ເທິງ​ພູ​ຕອນ​ທ່ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ດີທີ່ສຸດ, ເໜືອກວ່າ
meaning list.sentence: She is one of the top students in her class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນຶ່ງໃນນັກຮຽນທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດໃນຫ້ອງຮຽນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕະ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Please don’t touch the paintings in the museum.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຢ່າແຕະຕ້ອງຮູບແຕ້ມຢູ່ໃນຫໍພິພິທະພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ້າງຄວາມປະທັບໃຈ, ກະທົບກະເທືອນ
meaning list.sentence: Her kind words touched everyone in the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຳ​ເວົ້າ​ທີ່​ດີ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ໄດ້​ດຶງ​ດູດ​ທຸກ​ຄົນ​ໃນ​ຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເດີນທາງ, ການທ່ອງທ່ຽວ
meaning list.sentence: They went on a guided tour of the museum.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ໄປ​ຢ້ຽມ​ຢາມ​ພິ​ພິ​ທະ​ພັນ​.

meaning list.sentence: The band’s tour will cover 20 cities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການທ່ອງທ່ຽວຂອງວົງດົນຕີຈະກວມເອົາ 20 ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການທ່ອງທ່ຽວ
meaning list.sentence: Tourism is a major source of income for the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການທ່ອງທ່ຽວ​ແມ່ນ​ແຫຼ່ງລາຍ​ຮັບ​ທີ່​ສຳຄັນ​ຂອງ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປສູ່, ໃນທິດທາງຂອງ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: He ran towards the train station.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແລ່ນໄປຫາສະຖານີລົດໄຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວກັບ, ປະມານ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The project will cost towards $10,000.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍຂອງໂຄງການແມ່ນປະມານ 10,000 ໂດລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ້າເຊັດຕົວ
meaning list.sentence: She dried her hands with a soft towel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕາກໃຫ້ແຫ້ງດ້ວຍຜ້າຂົນຫນູອ່ອນໆ.

meaning list.sentence: The Eiffel Tower is one of the most famous landmarks in the world.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍ Eiffel ແມ່ນ ໜຶ່ງ ໃນບັນດາສະຖານທີ່ທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງທີ່ສຸດໃນໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫໍສັງເກດການ
meaning list.sentence: The guard watched over the castle from the tower.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງ​ໄດ້​ເບິ່ງ Castle ຈາກ tower ໄດ້​.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງຫຼິ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The child was excited to receive a new toy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກຜູ້ຊາຍຕື່ນເຕັ້ນຫຼາຍທີ່ຈະໄດ້ຮັບເຄື່ອງຫຼິ້ນໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະໜາດນ້ອຍ ຫຼືເພື່ອຄວາມມ່ວນຊື່ນ, ເຊັ່ນເຄື່ອງຫຼິ້ນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They bought a toy car for their nephew.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາຊື້ລົດຫຼິ້ນໃຫ້ຫລານຊາຍຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສັ້ນທາງ, ເສັ້ນທາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hikers followed the narrow track through the forest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຍ່າງປ່າໄດ້ໄປຕາມເສັ້ນທາງແຄບຜ່ານປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົດໄຟ, ເສັ້ນທາງລົດໄຟ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The train arrived on track 2.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄຟມາຮອດເສັ້ນທາງ 2.

meaning list.meaning: ເພງ, ສິ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This album has some amazing tracks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີເພງທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ຢູ່ໃນອັນລະບັ້ມນີ້.

meaning list.sentence: The festival is an important part of the local tradition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານ​ບຸນ​ແມ່ນ​ສ່ວນ​ໜຶ່ງ​ທີ່​ສຳ​ຄັນ​ຂອງ​ປະ​ເພ​ນີ​ທ້ອງ​ຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.sentence: They prepared a traditional meal for the guests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ກະກຽມ​ອາຫານ​ພື້ນ​ເມືອງ​ໃຫ້​ແກ່​ແຂກ​ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຶກສາ, ຝຶກຝົນ
meaning list.sentence: She trained her dog to obey commands.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຝຶກຝົນໝາຂອງລາວໃຫ້ເຊື່ອຟັງຄຳສັ່ງ.

meaning list.sentence: The fitness trainer designed a workout plan for him.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູຝຶກການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍໄດ້ກະກຽມແຜນການຝຶກອົບຮົມສໍາລັບລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຝຶກອົບຮົມ, ການຝຶກອົບຮົມ
meaning list.sentence: The company offers training programs for new employees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດສະເຫນີໂຄງການຝຶກອົບຮົມສໍາລັບພະນັກງານໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂົນສົ່ງ, ການຂົນສົ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: Public transport is widely used in big cities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂົນສົ່ງສາທາລະນະຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງໃນຕົວເມືອງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກທ່ອງທ່ຽວ, ຜູ້ໂດຍສານ
meaning list.sentence: The traveller shared stories from his adventures around the world.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກທ່ອງທ່ຽວໄດ້ແບ່ງປັນເລື່ອງລາວຈາກການຜະຈົນໄພທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນຫາ, ບັນຫາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company is facing financial trouble.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດກໍາລັງປະເຊີນບັນຫາທາງດ້ານການເງິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນຫາ, ບັນຫາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He went through a lot of trouble to organize the event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄປຫຼາຍບັນຫາໃນການຈັດງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົດບັນທຸກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The truck was loaded with fresh produce for the market.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດບັນທຸກດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ບັນທຸກສິນຄ້າສົດອອກສູ່ຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.sentence: The twins are very similar, but one is taller.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝາແຝດແມ່ນຄ້າຍຄືກັນຫຼາຍ, ແຕ່ຫນຶ່ງແມ່ນສູງ.

meaning list.sentence: They bought twin beds for the guest room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາຊື້ຕຽງຄູ່ສໍາລັບຫ້ອງຮັບແຂກ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳມະດາ, ທຳມະດາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It was a typical rainy day in London.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນມື້ທີ່ຝົນຕົກປົກກະຕິໃນລອນດອນ.

meaning list.sentence: The city has an extensive underground subway system.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງມີລະບົບລົດໄຟໃຕ້ດິນທີ່ກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.sentence: The treasure was buried underground.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສົມບັດໄດ້ຖືກຝັງໄວ້ໃຕ້ດິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈ, ຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: She has a deep understanding of mathematics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈຢ່າງເລິກເຊິ່ງກ່ຽວກັບຄະນິດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອົດທົນ, ຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: Her parents showed great understanding of her situation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວສະແດງຄວາມອົດທົນຫຼາຍຕໍ່ສະຖານະການຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: The temperature dropped to zero last night.
